Source code for Forecasting.testing_models

import numpy as np
from sklearn.base import  BaseEstimator




[docs]class IdenitityFrc(BaseEstimator):

    def __init__(self, name=None):
        self.name = name


[docs]    def fit(self, X, Y):
        if not np.all(X == Y):
            print "Warning! X and Y are not identical in identity model"




[docs]    def predict(self, X):
        return X




[docs]class MartingalFrc(BaseEstimator):
    """Forecasts n_out Y values by last n_out values of X"""

    def __init__(self, name=None):
        self.name = name


[docs]    def fit(self, X, Y):
        self.n_out = Y.shape[1]



[docs]    def predict(self, X):
        return X[:, -self.n_out:]
